attributes.action: Keep subsidised alcohol for military personnel
attributes.additional_details: The Defence Minister was apparently shocked whilst visiting the military units in the Falklands that she paid only £1 for a triple gin and tonic. She is now looking at ensuring military establishments full (town equivalent) prices. The government has taken almost every perk away from being in the forces. Over worked and under paid doesn't even scratch the surface. Why shouldn't the forces enjoy subsided messes?
